summary: A mercenary gets involved in a mission that threatens the lives of his kin. In order to succeed, he must break into one of the most wellguarded prisons in Eastern Europe and free the son of the most notorious drug lord in the world today.
cast: Steven Seagal|Jacqueline Lord|Roger Guenveur Smith|Luke Goss|Michael Kenneth Williams|Adrian Galley|Langley Kirkwood|Vivian Bieldt|Verity Price|Bruce Young|Peter Butler|Farouk Valley-Omar|Tumi Mogoje|Faye Peters|Zaa Nkweta|Ivaylo Geraskov|Shirly Brener|James Maritz|Shaia Wolf|Brent Palmer|Tauriq Jenkins|Akram Allie|Daniel Judes|Rudiger Eberle|Julian Koberman|Garth Collins|Andries Labuschagne|Julie Summers|George Bailey|Dan Hirst|Adam Horton|Adam Moon|Jeannie de Goveia|Herman Fontini|Richard Thompson|Ceci Carter|Jake Mervin|Lesley-Anne Down|Andrew Germishuys|Francois Grobbelaar|Grant Hulley
title: Mercenary
